CustomField.description: If Checked, user will be allowed to edit UPS International Commodity records that have already been used in a Shipment. Any changes made will no longer reflect the data submitted to UPS with the existing shipments.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Checked, user will be allowed to edit UPS International Commodity records that have already been used in a Shipment. Any changes made will no longer reflect the data submitted to UPS with the existing shipments.
CustomField.label: Allow Edit of Used Intl Commodity
